testopia.API
Class Build

java.lang.Object
  testopia.API.Build

public class Build
extends java.lang.Object

Allows the user to get a buildID from it's name, or it's name from the buildID. It can also create and update a build

Author:
anelson

Parameters:

milestone - string - the milestone. Can be null
